ch.bfh.ti.gravis.core.graph

Class EditGraphDecorator

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.uci.ics.jung.graph.GraphDecorator<IVertex,IEdge>
      • ch.bfh.ti.gravis.core.graph.EditGraphDecorator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IEditGraphObservable, IGravisGraph, edu.uci.ics.jung.graph.Graph<IVertex,IEdge>, edu.uci.ics.jung.graph.Hypergraph<IVertex,IEdge>, Serializable

     class EditGraphDecorator
extends edu.uci.ics.jung.graph.GraphDecorator<IVertex,IEdge>
implements IEditGraphObservable
    This implementation of the IEditGraphObservable interface decorates a graph of type IGravisGraph.
    Author:
    Patrick Kofmel (kofmp1@bfh.ch)
